snippet: The call for “peace through dialogue” with the Pakistani Taliban came after a day of talks by representatives of 27 political parties.

byline.original: By SALMAN MASOOD and DECLAN WALSH

lead_paragraph: The call for “peace through dialogue” with the Pakistani Taliban came after a day of talks by representatives of 27 political parties.

headline.main: Pakistani Political Parties Call for Talks With Taliban
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Political Parties Call for Talks With Taliban
